instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: LATE 2015 5K iMac 27inch with weird display issues
threads.message: Anyone have any experience with a 5k 27inch that shows strange video-issues? Dragging windows across the screen causes weird laggy display-issues; tearing image and weird reboots. Is this a videocard issue? I have tested with knowngood RAM already, but cant find any schematics/boardviews for this thing.

threads.title: LATE 2015 5K iMac 27inch with weird display issues
threads.message: The reboots confirm this is a GPU issue. Check if under 2 years old and in EU, then Apple will fix. I would not not even touch GPU on these as I suspect it may be VRAM or board trace issue.

threads.title: LATE 2015 5K iMac 27inch with weird display issues
threads.message: Ok the reboots haven’t happened so far with the internal HDD removed (could be coincidental). Could it be something else in that case? I am trying to doublecheck if anyone’s had any other issues as I don’t have any test parts for this model

threads.title: LATE 2015 5K iMac 27inch with weird display issues
threads.message: I gave you some advice  and got 0 feedback on it.....

threads.title: LATE 2015 5K iMac 27inch with weird display issues
threads.message:
No sorry, i am going to take that advice to heart, I wasn’t clear about that.
Was just asking to check if it might also be related to some other issue than the gpu...
